section.title: Overview
section.para: This module is an implementation of a local cache system designed as a hash table. It uses the Key-Value interface exported by OpenSIPS core.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para: The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &osips; with this module loaded:

section.title: cache_table_size (int)
section.para: The size of the hash table. This parameter will be used as the power of 2 when computing table size.

section.title: exec_threshold (int)
section.para: The maximum number of microseconds that a local cache query can last. Anything above the threshold will trigger a warning message to the log

para.emphasis: Default value is 0 ( unlimited - no warnings ).

section.title: cache_clean_period (int)
section.para: The time interval in seconds at which to go through all the records and delete the expired ones.
